mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUPBOARD(GBID, GID, MID, GBCONTENT, GBFILENAME) VALUES(GROUPBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gid}, #{mid}, #{gbcontent}, #{gbfilename})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN2, GB.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, GROUPBOARD.* FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE GID = #{gid} ORDER BY GBID DESC)GB ORDER BY RN2 DESC) WHERE RN2 BETWEEN 1 AND 20
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN2, GB.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, GROUPBOARD.* FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE GID = #{gid} ORDER BY GBID DESC)GB ORDER BY RN2 DESC) WHERE RN2 BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, GB.* FROM(SELECT * FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE GID = #{gid} ORDER BY GBID DESC) GB) WHERE RN = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, GB.* FROM(SELECT * FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE MID = #{mid} ORDER BY GBID DESC) GB) WHERE RN = 1
